Monitor. Protect. Collaborate.

Monitor, share and work on your data while preserving privacy

Connect data

Connect and profile data stored locally or remotely via our official agent.

Monitor data quality

Know your data quality. Ensure data integrity through monitoring. Now you are ready to unlock more ncode features.

Protect data assets

Private data is protected via transformation into machine readable (ncoded) or synthetic formats.

Collaborate on
data-driven projects

Work on data in secured format within own, third party or ncode environments.

ncode login --------------------------------------------------
Successfully logged in.
Welcome to ncode!
--------------------------------------------------
ncode data --all Found 1 data source ___________________________________________ id: 0x1234
"type: "local"
filename: "financial_transactions.csv" ___________________________________________ ncode alerts --data 0x1234 Generating alerts... Generated 2 alerts for data source 0x1234 ___________________________________________   -> "alert id": AL12349999
  -> "timestamp: "27-12-2020 8:44:12AM"
  -> "type": "columns"
  -> "colname": "amount"

n
code use cases

Detect issues, ensure compliance and
increase productivity when collaborating on data.

Data Engineering

Connect through an agent to allow ncode intelligent backend software analyze and generate data quality reports and alerts.


Forward alerts to the appropriate stakeholder, via the right channel

Data Science

Data & Analytics team seamlessly connects to Ncode to build, finesse and test models.


Collaboration is powered by mix and match data/model library and data remains in an encoded form at all time enabling compliance.

Business Application

Insurer builds products based on customer data located in different jurisdictions, where raw data export is prohibited under local regulations.

Each jurisdiction encodes the data and sends to the central facility in secure format for processing and analytics.

early access

Monitor data as easy as
one-two-three

Connect

A simple command connects your data using our agent

Monitor

The agent profiles your data, sending only metadata to ncode.

Action

Receive actionable email alerts as the data changes.
